definitions: a twisted or bent condition, state, or form
a thing that is complex and difficult to follow as a result of being deliberately distorted

examples.text: officials performed linguistic contortions trying to avoid a definitive answer

shortDefinitions: thing that is complex and difficult to follow

definitions: the skill of twisting and bending one's body into strange and unnatural positions, as a form of entertainment

examples.text: she has been performing contortion internationally for twelve years

shortDefinitions: skill of twisting body into strange and unnatural positions
